title: Total garbage
review:
Movie staff upvoting again.

Shut it off for the bad acting, garbage script, and terrible camera work.

title: Drama turned out to be a Horror
review: I had to wait until the 53rd minute to realize that it actually was a horror movie. Overall quite a good script considering it was a low budget movie and the fact that the actors were unknown to most of us.

title: Writer, Editor & Actors Deserve An Acid Drenching
review: Could've been a good thriller even on a low budget but the remedial writing and poor editing just eradicated this movie!
